name: Drumpf: Rise Up, Libertonia! Digital Artbook
detailed_description:
Digital Artbook for Drumpf: Rise Up, Libertonia!

Features:
  • Total number of pages: 71.
  • Format for Art book is .pdf.
  • Contains images of all of the characters, enemies, and companions found in Drumpf: Rise Up, Libertonia!.
  • Includes some backstory on the main characters and The Usurpers that are found in Drumpf: Rise Up, Libertonia!.
  • Digital Art book can be located in: ..\Steam\steamapps\common\Drumpf Rise Up Libertonia\Digital Artbook\
